get.description:
OpenApi3 schema for this API. Format can be selected via content negotiation.

- YAML: application/vnd.oai.openapi
- JSON: application/vnd.oai.openapi+json

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Only return playlog entries starting with this datetime.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: skipSynced
parameters.description: Only return playlogs entries which are in unsynced state on the main node

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Only return playlogs entries starting up until this datetime.

get.summary: List recent music entries in the playlog.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Only return playlog entries starting with this datetime.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: skipSynced
parameters.description: Only return playlogs entries which are in unsynced state on the main node

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Only return playlogs entries starting up until this datetime.

errors.detail: Kann die Accept Kopfzeile der Anfrage nicht erfüllen.

get.summary: Retrieve the currently playing music entry from the playlog.

mediaSource.description: A copy of the media source from steering at the time of creation. Be aware that this copy may not reflect the current steering media source type, as this field is not updated to reflect any changes.

isMusicTrack.title: Is music
isMusicTrack.description: Playlog entries that are classified as music will be exposed in the track service endpoint.

mediaId.title: Media
mediaId.description: Reference to the media object in steering.

timeslotId.title: Timeslot
timeslotId.description: Reference to the timeslot object in steering.

showId.title: Show
showId.description: Reference to the show object in steering.

mediaSourceId.title: Media source
mediaSourceId.description: Reference to the media source object in steering.

PlaylogMetadata.description:
By default, the metadata field contains the artist, album and title fields.
You may add other arbitrary fields if you want.

code.description:
* `date` - date
* `invalid` - invalid
* `make_aware` - make_aware
* `null` - null
* `overflow` - overflow
* `required` - required

api-host.description: Hostname or IP for API Host
